channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Camel
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Camel

item.title: CVE-2017-5643|2024-08-05T15:04:15.368Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20camel
item.description: Apache Camel's Validation Component is vulnerable against SSRF via remote DTDs and XXE.

item.title: CVE-2018-8041|2024-08-05T06:46:13.596Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20camel
item.description: Apache Camel's Mail 2.20.0 through 2.20.3, 2.21.0 through 2.21.1 and 2.22.0 is vulnerable to path traversal.

item.title: CVE-2018-8027|2024-08-05T06:46:12.239Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20camel
item.description: Apache Camel 2.20.0 to 2.20.3 and 2.21.0 Core is vulnerable to XXE in XSD validation processor.

item.title: CVE-2017-12633|2024-08-05T18:43:56.449Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20camel
item.description: The camel-hessian component in Apache Camel 2.x before 2.19.4 and 2.20.x before 2.20.1 is vulnerable to Java object de-serialisation vulnerability. De-serializing untrusted data can lead to security flaws.

item.title: CVE-2017-3159|2024-08-05T14:16:28.249Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20camel
item.description: Apache Camel's camel-snakeyaml component is vulnerable to Java object de-serialization vulnerability. De-serializing untrusted data can lead to security flaws.

item.title: CVE-2017-12634|2024-08-05T18:43:56.451Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20camel
item.description: The camel-castor component in Apache Camel 2.x before 2.19.4 and 2.20.x before 2.20.1 is vulnerable to Java object de-serialisation vulnerability. De-serializing untrusted data can lead to security flaws.

item.title: CVE-2024-22369|2024-07-05T17:21:47.970Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20camel
item.description:
Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in Apache Camel SQL ComponentThis issue affects Apache Camel: from 3.0.0 before 3.21.4, from 3.22.0 before 3.22.1, from 4.0.0 before 4.0.4, from 4.1.0 before 4.4.0.
Users are recommended to upgrade to version 4.4.0, which fixes the issue. If users are on the 4.0.x LTS releases stream, then they are suggested to upgrade to 4.0.4. If users are on 3.x, they are suggested to move to 3.21.4 or 3.22.1

item.title: CVE-2024-23114|2024-02-20T14:59:38.326Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20camel
item.description:
Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in Apache Camel CassandraQL Component AggregationRepository which is vulnerable to unsafe deserialization. Under specific conditions it is possible to deserialize malicious payload.This issue affects Apache Camel: from 3.0.0 before 3.21.4, from 3.22.0 before 3.22.1, from 4.0.0 before 4.0.4, from 4.1.0 before 4.4.0.
Users are recommended to upgrade to version 4.4.0, which fixes the issue. If users are on the 4.0.x LTS releases stream, then they are suggested to upgrade to 4.0.4. If users are on 3.x, they are suggested to move to 3.21.4 or 3.22.1

item.title: CVE-2024-22369|2024-02-20T14:58:36.291Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20camel
item.description:
Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in Apache Camel SQL ComponentThis issue affects Apache Camel: from 3.0.0 before 3.21.4, from 3.22.0 before 3.22.1, from 4.0.0 before 4.0.4, from 4.1.0 before 4.4.0.
Users are recommended to upgrade to version 4.4.0, which fixes the issue. If users are on the 4.0.x LTS releases stream, then they are suggested to upgrade to 4.0.4. If users are on 3.x, they are suggested to move to 3.21.4 or 3.22.1

item.title: CVE-2024-22371|2024-02-26T09:22:38.384Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20camel
item.description:
Exposure of sensitive data by by crafting a malicious EventFactory and providing a custom ExchangeCreatedEvent that exposes sensitive data. Vulnerability in Apache Camel.This issue affects Apache Camel: from 3.21.X through 3.21.3, from 3.22.X through 3.22.0, from 4.0.X through 4.0.3, from 4.X through 4.3.0.
Users are recommended to upgrade to version 3.21.4, 3.22.1, 4.0.4 or 4.4.0, which fixes the issue.

item.title: CVE-2024-22369|2024-08-01T22:43:34.477Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20camel
item.description:
Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in Apache Camel SQL ComponentThis issue affects Apache Camel: from 3.0.0 before 3.21.4, from 3.22.0 before 3.22.1, from 4.0.0 before 4.0.4, from 4.1.0 before 4.4.0.
Users are recommended to upgrade to version 4.4.0, which fixes the issue. If users are on the 4.0.x LTS releases stream, then they are suggested to upgrade to 4.0.4. If users are on 3.x, they are suggested to move to 3.21.4 or 3.22.1

item.title: CVE-2024-23114|2024-08-01T22:51:11.265Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20camel
item.description:
Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in Apache Camel CassandraQL Component AggregationRepository which is vulnerable to unsafe deserialization. Under specific conditions it is possible to deserialize malicious payload.This issue affects Apache Camel: from 3.0.0 before 3.21.4, from 3.22.0 before 3.22.1, from 4.0.0 before 4.0.4, from 4.1.0 before 4.4.0.
Users are recommended to upgrade to version 4.4.0, which fixes the issue. If users are on the 4.0.x LTS releases stream, then they are suggested to upgrade to 4.0.4. If users are on 3.x, they are suggested to move to 3.21.4 or 3.22.1

item.title: CVE-2024-22371|2024-08-01T22:43:34.525Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20camel
item.description:
Exposure of sensitive data by by crafting a malicious EventFactory and providing a custom ExchangeCreatedEvent that exposes sensitive data. Vulnerability in Apache Camel.This issue affects Apache Camel: from 3.21.X through 3.21.3, from 3.22.X through 3.22.0, from 4.0.X through 4.0.3, from 4.X through 4.3.0.
Users are recommended to upgrade to version 3.21.4, 3.22.1, 4.0.4 or 4.4.0, which fixes the issue.

Users are recommended to upgrade to version 3.21.4, 3.22.1, 4.0.4 or 4.4.0, which fixes the issue.
